casebody.data:
MAKILA LAND CO., LLC., Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Jonah Ke'eaumoku KAPU, Defendant-Appellant, Heirs or Assigns of Kua (k), Kainoa (w), also known as Kainoa Kikue Olala (w), and Samuel Hiku Kahalia; John Paul Kapu; Victoria Q. White; Kalani Kapu; and all whom it may concern, Defendants-Appellees NO. CAAP-17-0000358 Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. February 28, 2019

SUMMARY DISPOSITION ORDER

Affirmed.
